query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid, est.senduserid, est.operateuserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.status=1

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid, est.senduserid, est.operateuserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null)

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.sendroleid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.status=1

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.sendroleid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null)
